replies.body: [**Minimum Specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654) suggest at the least a 2GHz processor, but you might still be able to run League decently depending on what exact processor you have. I wouldn't be surprised if it doesn't work too well, and you may need to upgrade at some point sadly.

Minimum processor speed is 2HGz, but try this tutorial:
EDITED FOR THIRD PARTY DOWNLOADS ------------------------
It improves fps a lot and makes League run on low-end PCs.
